menu_items.name: Family Christmas Dinner $375
menu_items.detail:
Feds 6 to 8 people. Available the month of December. Reserve now. Availability limited.

STARTERS
Padre Garden Salad or Caesar Salad
Padre Dinner Rolls with Whipped Butter and Pecan Smoked Sea Salt

MAINS
1 Whole Roasted Autonomy Farms Chicken
Choice of: Peppercorn Crusted Prime Rib or Leg of Lamb Roulade

SIDES
Butter Whipped Yukon Gold Potatoes
Maple Roasted Heirloom Carrots
Crispy Brussel Sprouts with Candied Pecans and Gorgonzola

DESSERT
Apple Crisp with Vanilla Creme Anglaise
White Chocolate Pot De Cremes with Candy Cane Bark
